description:
Panic sweeps Screw Island as all the screws begin losing their ridges. Nejiru in a panic, and Peyket and Heybot won`t stop fighting over whether they should still be called screws, or reclassified as nails! Will the plot be resolved in a logical fashion, or will it simply dropped for next week?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ギザギザ・ザ・ネジ山
